user.not_minter: You do not have the required role

add_to_home_screen.title: Add Instruement to your home screen
add_to_home_screen.description: Tap the share icon of your web browser and select the "Add to home screen" option.

request_to_luthier.title: About your account and sharing it with a luthier
request_to_luthier.description: Your account is represented by a number starting with "0x" and you can share it openly without any risk. For you to receive the registration of an instrument the sender – in this case your luthier –  needs your account number. Share it through your prefered communication channel like mail or chat.

share_account_what.title: Your Account Number
share_account_what.description: The account number is a unique identifier that was automatically created when you opened your account. This number allows you to receive instrument registrations securely, as it only works for incoming transfers. You can share it with luthiers and other users to receive instrument registrations in your account. Once a registration is transferred to your account using this number, you will be the sole owner of that registration.

share_account_how.title: How to share your account number
share_account_how.description: Ideally you will use the messaging channel your already established with the other party. It can be f.e. email or any chat app or social network. If you use your mobile phone, you have the option to show a QR code which the Luthier will scan to obtain your account number.

membership.title: About your membership
membership.description: A brief description about your membership.

register_instrument.title: About Registering an instrument
register_instrument.description: A brief description about registering an instrument.

invite_to_instrument.title: Invite to join Instruement
invite_to_instrument.description: A brief description about sending inviting to the instruement platform.

apply_for_verification.title: About applying for verification
apply_for_verification.description: You can apply for being a verified Luthier by filling out a form.

invite_your_luthier.title: Invite your luthier to join Instruement
invite_your_luthier.description: A brief description about sending inviting to the instruement platform.

Metadata.title: Instruement
Metadata.description: Manage your valuable musical instruments with self-custody blockchain technology.

DraftGrid.description: Instruments pending registration completion. You can save changes and finish later.

NFTGrid.description: Instruments under your ownership. You can manage settings, view data or initiate their transfer.

title.new_sub_heading: Complete these steps to register your instrument
title.edit_sub_heading: Continue completing the steps to register your instrument
title.ready_to_register_sub: You can now preview and register your instrument

type.label: Instrument type
type.description: Available options reflect your endorsed construction skills
type.type_set_description: To set a different type create a new draft
type.description_modal: When registering an instrument, you can choose from instrument types that correspond to your endorsed construction skills. For example, if you have the "Violin construction" endorsement, you'll see "Violin" as an available option in the dropdown menu. This ensures that each registered instrument reflects your verified expertise as a luthier.

name.label: Instrument name
name.description: Choose a meaningful name for your instrument
name.description_modal: Choose a meaningful name for your instrument. This will help you identify it later.

cover.title: Cover
cover.description: Primary image of the instrument. Accepts JPG and PNG format

images.title: Images
images.description: Register a minimum of two additional images of views and details of the instrument. No need to upload again the cover image. In JPG and PNG format

files.title: Documents
files.description: Register additional documents in PDF format. Documents are optional.

description.title: Text
description.description: Detailed description of the instrument. This text will be available to the public.

images.text_area_placeholder: Add a description for this image

files.text_area_placeholder: Add a description for this document

Instrument.transfer_management_description: As the owner of this instrument, you can transfer the ownership of the asset to a different account.
Instrument.in_person_transfer_description: For maximum security and speed, transfer the instrument while both parties are present
Instrument.remote_transfer_description: Transfer the instrument at a distance by sharing a secure link with the recipient
Instrument.step_1_description: Ask the recipient to open the Instruement app on their phone. If they don't have it yet, share a direct link.
Instrument.step_2_description: Scan the QR code on the recipient's home screen.
Instrument.step_3_waiting_for_scan: Waiting for QR scan result. No rush.
Instrument.step_3_description: Finally, transfer the record to the scanned account
Instrument.step_1_remote_description: Copy and share a secure link with the recipient. Use your preferred messaging app.
Instrument.step_2_remote_description: The recipient will open the link and immediately see the button to copy the transfer confirmation link. They must share that link with you.
Instrument.step_3_remote_description: Open the acceptance link to see the final send button.
Instrument.remote_transfer_confirmation_valid_descr: To proceed, copy and share the transfer confirmation link with the owner of the instrument.
Instrument.remote_transfer_confirmation_invalid_des: Please review the transfer link or contact the owner of the instrument to get a new link.
Instrument.remote_transfer_step_3_description: You can now transfer the instrument to the new owner.
Instrument.remote_transfer_step_3_invalid_descripti: The transfer link is invalid. Check the received link and try again.

PaymentResult.failed_message: Something went wrong with the payment. We have been notified and will contact you shortly.

Minter.hello_sub: we welcome you to our simple but powerful digital tool for Luthiers. In our quick introduction video you will learn how to register your first instrument.
Minter.register_text: As verified luthier you can register instruments of your endorsed skills
